Class AddCommand

java.lang.Object
org.example.homework.Commands.CommandUtil
org.example.homework.Commands.AddCommand
public class AddCommand extends CommandUtil
clasa AddCommand extinde clasa abstracta CommandUil, si se ocupa cu adaugarea unui document in catalog
